name: The Baby Farm - LD 44
description:
Congratulations on buying your very own baby farm!

Here is everything you'll need to know to be a successful farmer!

You get seven days(28 minutes) to earn as many points as possible!

The item you are currently holding is shown above you.

Z - Picks items up.

X - Puts items down/ Uses the item.

A stork will come to collect the babies. Give the stork the babies to earn score.

Pick up a seed and plant it in your field. Then, give your baby some food and a bottle. You can see what a baby wants by the indicator above it. If you don't feed your baby, it'll DIE and you'll have to put it in the "Completely Moral" bin.

When your baby is fully grown (Shovel indicator), use the shovel to harvest it. Next, you should either give it to the Stork or put it in the crib to give later.  Harvest quickly or it'll turn into a teenager which you will have to put in the "Completely Moral" bin.
